htmlContent:
Decrement DEFCON, then award USA 2 VP.

If South Korea is USA-controlled, USA may spread influence or perform realignments with this card.
name: Soviets Shoot Down KAL-007*
plainContent:
Decrement DEFCON, then award USA 2 VP.
If South Korea is USA-controlled, USA may spread influence or perform realignments with this card.
